Remove trailing and leading spaces from a character vector

Remove trailing and leading spaces from a character vector

trim(x)

Arguments

x
a character vector

Value

a version of x without trailing OR leading spaces

See also

str_trim

Examples

trim("foo ")
#> [1] "foo"
#> 
trim(" bar ")
#> [1] "bar"
#> 
trim("baz")
#> [1] "baz"
#>
